# Module: tf.contrib.seq2seq

### Module `tf.contrib.seq2seq`

Ops for building neural network seq2seq decoders and losses.

## Members

[`attention_decoder_fn_inference(...)`](../../tf/contrib/seq2seq/attention_decoder_fn_inference): Attentional decoder function for `dynamic_rnn_decoder` during inference.

[`attention_decoder_fn_train(...)`](../../tf/contrib/seq2seq/attention_decoder_fn_train): Attentional decoder function for `dynamic_rnn_decoder` during training.

[`sequence_loss(...)`](../../tf/contrib/seq2seq/sequence_loss): Weighted cross-entropy loss for a sequence of logits (per example).
